FuncDef: This command specifies the value of the change reporting action IE sends to the peer in applicable messages. The peer needs to indicate support first using the appropriate flag in the indication IE.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the reporting action value as per TS 29.274. Values-0 to 255, cgi-sai, rai, tai, ecgi, cgi-sai-rai, tai-ecgi.
